smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function instantiateItem appears to be too complex.
The function searchCourses appears to be too complex.
The function fillSchedule appears to be too complex.
The function loginPressed appears to be too complex.
The function convert appears to be too complex.
The function convert appears to be too complex.
The function convert appears to be too complex.
The function run appears to be too complex.

smells.name: LongMethod
smells.description: One method should have one responsibility. Long methods tend to handle many things at once. Prefer smaller methods to make them easier to understand.

instances.message: The function searchCourses is too long. The maximum length is 20.

smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

instances.message: Class ScheduleActivity is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.

smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

instances.message: Function fillSchedule is nested too deeply.
Function convert is nested too deeply.
Function convert is nested too deeply.
Function convert is nested too deeply.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'ScheduleActivity' with '12' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.name: ComplexCondition
smells.description: Complex conditions should be simplified and extracted into well-named methods if necessary.

instances.message: This condition is too complex.
This condition is too complex.
This condition is too complex.

smells.name: StringLiteralDuplication
smells.description: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

instances.message: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

smells.name: LongParameterList
smells.description: The more parameters a method has the more complex it is. Long parameter lists are often used to control complex algorithms and violate the Single Responsibility Principle. Prefer methods with short parameter lists.

instances.message: The function search has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.

smells.name: TooGenericExceptionCaught
smells.description: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

instances.message: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.
Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.
Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

smells.name: FunctionParameterNaming
smells.description: Function parameter names should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Function parameter names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Function parameter names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Function parameter names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: ObjectPropertyNaming
smells.description: Property names inside objects should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Private object property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Private object property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: MatchingDeclarationName
smells.description: If a source file contains only a single non-private top-level class or object, the file name should reflect the case-sensitive name plus the .kt extension.

instances.message: The file name 'General.kt' does not match the name of the single top-level declaration 'DayUtils'.

smells.name: LateinitUsage
smells.description: Usage of lateinit detected. Using lateinit for property initialization is error prone, try using constructor injection or delegation.

instances.message: Usages of latinit should be avoided.
Usages of latinit should be avoided.

smells.name: UnsafeCast
smells.description: Cast operator throws an exception if the cast is not possible.

instances.message: body cannot be safely cast to ArrayList<CourseResult>.
getSystemService(Context.NOTIFICATION_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to NotificationManager.
context.getSystemService(Context.ALARM_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to AlarmManager.
context.getSystemService(Context.ALARM_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to AlarmManager.

smells.name: UnsafeCallOnNullableType
smells.description: It will throw a NullPointerException at runtime if your nullable value is null.

instances.message: Calling !! on a nullable type will throw a NullPointerException at runtime in case the value is null. It should be avoided.
Calling !! on a nullable type will throw a NullPointerException at runtime in case the value is null. It should be avoided.
Calling !! on a nullable type will throw a NullPointerException at runtime in case the value is null. It should be avoided.
Calling !! on a nullable type will throw a NullPointerException at runtime in case the value is null. It should be avoided.
Calling !! on a nullable type will throw a NullPointerException at runtime in case the value is null. It should be avoided.

smells.name: EqualsWithHashCodeExist
smells.description: Always override hashCode when you override equals. All hash-based collections depend on objects meeting the equals-contract. Two equal objects must produce the same hashcode. When inheriting equals or hashcode, override the inherited and call the super method for clarification.

instances.message: A class should always override hashCode when overriding equals and the other way around.
A class should always override hashCode when overriding equals and the other way around.

smells.name: PreferToOverPairSyntax
smells.description: Pair was created using the Pair constructor, using the to syntax is preferred.

instances.message: Pair is created by using the pair constructor. This can replaced by `it to homePageManager.getTitle(it)`
Pair is created by using the pair constructor. This can replaced by `it.id to marker`
Pair is created by using the pair constructor. This can replaced by `it to homePageManager.getTitle(it)`
Pair is created by using the pair constructor. This can replaced by `it to it.getString(context)`
Pair is created by using the pair constructor. This can replaced by `LocalDate.parse(startDate, dtf) to LocalDate.parse(endDate, dtf)`
Pair is created by using the pair constructor. This can replaced by `Season.getSeasonFromTitle(semesterItems[0]) to semesterItems[1]`
Pair is created by using the pair constructor. This can replaced by `Season.getSeasonFromTitle(semesterItems[3]) to semesterItems[4]`
Pair is created by using the pair constructor. This can replaced by `Season.getSeasonFromTitle(semesterItems[1]) to semesterItems[2]`
Pair is created by using the pair constructor. This can replaced by `parseDate(term, startDate) to parseDate(term, endDate)`

smells.description: Restrict the number of return statements in methods.

Function login has 3 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.
Function handleLogin has 3 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.
Function parseStatement has 5 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.
Function parseAmount has 3 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.
Function parseDateMDRange has 3 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.
Function parseCourse has 12 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (extension) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: extension
Parentheses in (body as ArrayList<CourseResult>) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: body as ArrayList<CourseResult>

smells.name: MandatoryBracesIfStatements
smells.description: Multi-line if statement was found that does not have braces. These should be added to improve readability.

instances.message: Multi-line if statement was found that does not have braces. These should be added to improve readability.
Multi-line else statement was found that does not have braces.These should be added to improve readability

smells.name: UseDataClass
smells.description: Classes that do nothing but hold data should be replaced with a data class.

instances.message: The class CourseHolder defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.
The class TranscriptResponse defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.

smells.name: ForbiddenComment
smells.description: Flags a forbidden comment. Defaults values are TODO:, FIXME: or STOPSHIP:

instances.message: This comment contains text that has been defined as forbidden in detekt.
This comment contains text that has been defined as forbidden in detekt.

smells.name: UnusedPrivateMember
smells.description: Private member is unused.

instances.message: Private property oldTranscript is unused.
Private property GRADES_ID is unused.
Private property SEATS_ID is unused.
Private function checkGrades is unused.
Private function checkSeats is unused.
Private function createNotification is unused.
Private property rows is unused.
Private property i is unused.

smells.name: MayBeConst
smells.description: Reports vals that can be const val instead.

instances.message: GRADES_ID can be a `const val`.
SEATS_ID can be a `const val`.

smells.name: LoopWithTooManyJumpStatements
smells.description: The loop contains more than one break or continue statement. The code should be refactored to increase readability.

instances.message: The loop contains more than one break or continue statement. The code should be refactored to increase readability.

smells.name: UnusedImports
smells.description: Unused Imports are dead code and should be removed.

instances.message: The import 'com.guerinet.mymartlet.model.Semester' is unused.

smells.name: DataClassContainsFunctions
smells.description: Data classes should mainly be used to store data and should not have any extra functions. (Compiler will automatically generate equals, toString and hashCode functions)

instances.message: The data class Semester contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called getName

smells.name: SerialVersionUIDInSerializableClass
smells.description: A class which implements the Serializable interface does not define a correct serialVersionUID field. The serialVersionUID field should be a constant long value inside a companion object.

instances.message: The class Term implements the Serializable interface and should thus define a serialVersionUID.

smells.name: UnnecessaryAbstractClass
smells.description: An abstract class is unnecessary and can be refactored. An abstract class should have both abstract and concrete properties or functions. An abstract class without a concrete member can be refactored to an interface. An abstract class without an abstract member can be refactored to a concrete class.

instances.message: An abstract class without an abstract member can be refactored to a concrete class.
